PROGRAM OFFERING
PROGRAM OFFERING
Title: PATTERNS OF THOUGHT
Type: Panel Discussion
Time: 15:00
No.: Continuous
Origin: University of Utah
Audience: Adult
Serial Number: 56-10
Release Date: January 6, 1957
This series of programs presents discussions of vital and interesting topics as
seen through the eyes of philosophers. The topics involved are of universal
significance, and the informal approach of the discussants gives the programs a
conversational quality.
The moderator for each discussion is Dr. Laverne C. Bane of the University of
Utah Speech Department, The programs are planned by Dr. Waldemer P, Reed,
Chairman, Department of Philosophy, University of Utah,
The specific topics and speakers for this quarterns series of PATTERNS OF
THOUGHT are not definite at this time. When that information is available, it
will be passed on to all stations.
